  import KOBOLDMAKI-ROOT-MIB (koboldmaki-oss);

//
// MODULE META INFORMATION
//

  organization      
     "Uwe Ebel, koboldmaki";

  contact           
     "Uwe Ebel";

  description

  revision {
    date            "2015-12-25 00:01";
    description     
       "initial version";
  };

  identity          icinga2;

//
// OBJECT DEFINITIONS
//


  node icinga2 {
    oid             koboldmaki-oss.2;
  };

  node icinga2Type {
    oid             icinga2.1;
    description     
       "All icinga type definitions like host, service, etc.";
  };

  scalar i2ObjectType {
    oid             icinga2Type.1;
    type            Enumeration (host(1), service(2), 
                      hostgroup(3), servicegroup(4), 
                      hostescalation(5), serviceescalation(6), 
                      hostdependency(7), servicedependency(8), 
                      timeperiod(9), contact(10), 
                      contactgroup(11), command(12), 
                      endpoint(13), zone(14));
    description     
       "Objecttype, id mapping type";
  };

  scalar i2StateType {
    oid             icinga2Type.3;
    type            Enumeration (stateTypeSoft(0), 
                      stateTypeHard(1));
    description     
       "Service state";
    reference       
       "https://github.com/Icinga/icinga2/tree/master/lib/icinga/checkable.ti";
  };

  scalar i2HostState {
    oid             icinga2Type.4;
    type            Enumeration (hostUp(0), hostDown(1));
    description     
       "Host state";
    reference       
       "https://github.com/Icinga/icinga2/tree/master/lib/icinga/checkable.ti";
  };

  scalar i2ServiceState {
    oid             icinga2Type.5;
    type            Enumeration (serviceOK(0), serviceWarning(1), 
                      serviceCritical(2), serviceUnknown(3));
    description     
       "Service state, https://github.com/Icinga/icinga2/tree/master/lib/icinga/checkable.ti";
  };

  node icinga2Notifications {
    oid             icinga2.2;
    description     
       "Parent of all notifications like traps, informations etc.";
  };

  node icinga2Traps {
    oid             icinga2.3;
    description     
       "Trap type definitions";
  };

  node icinga2Groups {
    oid             icinga2.4;
    description     
       "Conformance";
  };

  node icinga2Conformance {
    oid             icinga2.5;
    description     
       "Compliance";
  };

  node icinga2Compliance {
    oid             icinga2.6;
    description     
       "Compliance";
  };

//
// NOTIFICATION DEFINITIONS
//

  notification i2HostTrap {
    oid             icinga2Notifications.1;
    objects         (i2HostState);
    description     
       "Host trap";
  };

  notification i2ServiceTrap {
    oid             icinga2Notifications.2;
    objects         (i2ServiceState);
    description     
       "Service trap";
  };

//
// GROUP DEFINITIONS
//

  group i2ComplianceTypeGroup {
    oid             icinga2Groups.1;
    members         (i2ObjectType, i2StateType);
    description     
       "Group for compliance";
  };

  group i2ComplianceStateGroup {
    oid             icinga2Groups.2;
    members         (i2ServiceState, i2HostState);
    description     
       "Group with state objects for compliance";
  };

  group i2ComplianceTrapGroup {
    oid             icinga2Groups.3;
    members         (i2HostTrap, i2ServiceTrap);
    description     
       "Trap group for compliance";
  };

//
// COMPLIANCE DEFINITIONS
//

  compliance i2Compliance {
    oid             icinga2Compliance.1;
    description     
       "A DES";

    optional i2ComplianceTypeGroup {
      description   
         "Objects";
    };
    optional i2ComplianceStateGroup {
      description   
         "Object Type";
    };
    optional i2ComplianceTrapGroup {
      description   
         "Traps";
    };
  };

}; // end of module KOBOLDMAKI-ICINGA2-MIB.
